$interpreted: Sophie: General Lazer, why...?
Devious: Hssssss. Quite a look of surprise.
Sophie: You-You two...aren't you two the worst of enemies?
Devious: This chameleon is a general of renowned fame. How could I disdain such a great figure?
Devious: Plus, he did give up on his place of birth, the Kingdom of the Sun. Betrayal is as natural to him as eating and sleeping.
Lazer: ......
Rune: Gen...eral?
Devious: Enough already, kill them!!
Rune: *heavy breathing*...huh?
Rune: ...Strange.
Clark: Strange? What's strange?
Rune: Lazer.
Clark: What's strange about him? Looks like he's quite the fighter.
Rune: I can't say...but something is not right.
Clark: Well, I don't know what to say, but...
Clark: Wait a second. This is a lab...there's no way that...
Clark: Hey, didn't Sanchez say that the High Priest was letting Yusuf smuggle in illegal drugs? Those drugs must have been being used on...
Devious: Hsssss. That's right. They were for my experiments.
Devious: Yusuf was nothing more than a lowly slave. His desire for money caused his demise. Selling my precious drugs...I had to shut his mouth forever.
Sophie: What are these mortifying experiments for!?
Devious: Don't you worry. When you become my test subject, you'll get to see up close and personal. It's a mystical experience of the highest order.
Sophie: Scum!
Clark: Rune! Sophie! I think that Lazer is being brainwashed by those drugs!
Sophie: Drugs!? So that's what it was...
Sophie: That's why Rune thought he was acting strange. Even if he was brainwashed, what are we going to do about it?
Clark: While I was at the Academy, I studied some healing Runes. Let's see if any of them work.
Clark: Help me keep Lazer at bay, but don't damage him too badly!
Sophie: Easier said than done...
Rune: ...Sophie, he helped me...I want to help him...please...
Sophie: *groan*...got it, let's do this!
Clark: Great!
Clark: Maria, you ready?
Maria: Maria is ready for orders, master!
Clark: Follow me!
Clark: Nothing...what's wrong with these Runes?
Sophie: Clark, how much longer? We can't hold him much longer!
Clark: Rats! If it keeps going like this...there's no hope...
Rune: So...phie!!!
Rune: *gasp*...!
Sophie: Rune!
Sophie: You fool! Why'd you block that for me!?
Rune: ...Because I asked for Sophie's...help.
Lazer: ...Stop wasting your energy.
Lazer: I don't know what you aren't getting. I've been clear-headed this whole time.
Rune: But why?
Lazer: Don't misunderstand me, young man. Before, I was not helping you. I was helping Diana.
Lazer: I'd do anything for that child!
Maria: Master Clark! Chu Chu!
Maria: I can not forgive you for what you have done to Chu Chu...
Maria: ...and my master!!!!
Maria: Ω  !!!!!!!
Sanchez: Snap out of it!!!! Let's go!!!!
Clark: Sanchez!?
Sanchez: Don't look back! Keep running!!!

Model.Text: General Lazer, why...?
Hssssss. Quite a look of surprise.
You-You two...aren't you two the worst of enemies?
This chameleon is a general of renowned fame. How could I disdain such a great figure?
Plus, he did give up on his place of birth, the Kingdom of the Sun. Betrayal is as natural to him as eating and sleeping.
Gen...eral?
Enough already, kill them!!
*heavy breathing*...huh?
...Strange.
Strange? What's strange?
Lazer.
What's strange about him? Looks like he's quite the fighter.
I can't say...but something is not right.
Well, I don't know what to say, but...
Wait a second. This is a lab...there's no way that...
Hey, didn't Sanchez say that the High Priest was letting Yusuf smuggle in illegal drugs? Those drugs must have been being used on...
Hsssss. That's right. They were for my experiments.
Yusuf was nothing more than a lowly slave. His desire for money caused his demise. Selling my precious drugs...I had to shut his mouth forever.
What are these mortifying experiments for!?
Don't you worry. When you become my test subject, you'll get to see up close and personal. It's a mystical experience of the highest order.
Scum!
Rune! Sophie! I think that Lazer is being brainwashed by those drugs!
Drugs!? So that's what it was...
That's why Rune thought he was acting strange. Even if he was brainwashed, what are we going to do about it?
While I was at the Academy, I studied some healing Runes. Let's see if any of them work.
Help me keep Lazer at bay, but don't damage him too badly!
Easier said than done...
...Sophie, he helped me...I want to help him...please...
*groan*...got it, let's do this!
Great!
Maria, you ready?
Maria is ready for orders, master!
Follow me!
Nothing...what's wrong with these Runes?
Clark, how much longer? We can't hold him much longer!
Rats! If it keeps going like this...there's no hope...
So...phie!!!
*gasp*...!
Rune!
You fool! Why'd you block that for me!?
...Because I asked for Sophie's...help.
...Stop wasting your energy.
I don't know what you aren't getting. I've been clear-headed this whole time.
But why?
Don't misunderstand me, young man. Before, I was not helping you. I was helping Diana.
I'd do anything for that child!
Master Clark! Chu Chu!
I can not forgive you for what you have done to Chu Chu...
...and my master!!!!
Snap out of it!!!! Let's go!!!!
Sanchez!?
Don't look back! Keep running!!!
